entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
